title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game ZoneX.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game ZoneX.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: In the shadows of war-torn streets, the compact submachine gun rests, an embodiment of precision and power. Sleek and tactical, its matte black finish absorbs the faintest glimmers of light, rendering it almost invisible in the dark. With a magazine capacity that promises agility in the heat of combat, this weapon is designed for swift engagements and close-quarters skirmishes. A picatinny rail adorns the top, an invitation for customizationâ€”lasers, sights, or grips to suit the user's needs. As you grip the cold, sturdy handle, a sense of confidence surges; you are ready to confront whatever dangers lie ahead.
